content.question: Spheres A, B, and C are arranged on the <math alttext="x y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis as shown. What is the electric flux through a Gaussian sphere of radius <math alttext="80 cm" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>80</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> centered on the origin?

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative fraction 4 q over epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative fraction 2 q over epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative fraction q over epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction q over epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction 9 q over epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the positive fraction q over epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
